name: Party Masker
description:
Game created at IGJAM16 @ GamesCom.

You are woken up by a phone call from your father. He tells you that both of your parents will be home in about five minutes, but there is a problem... There was a heavy party at your place last night and you don't have much time to tidy it up, so you have to mask it up.

To reach the best score, you need to figure out best ways to mask the mess (place objects over stains, hide junk in unusual locations ect...).

Not all features are working yet, game is in development.

Created by: The FingerBangers

Programing: Lukas Kleiza

Art: Laurynas Mazeika
